page.title: 14Transport In Mayfield.
page.content: Mayfield has only one bus service & no railway so public transport is very limit.The bus runs from Heathfield to Tunbridge Wells passing through Mayfield in each direction once an hour.Unfortunately the service finishes at about 7pm.so villagers cannot use buses for any evening activities.The nearest railway stations are at Wadhurst & Jarvis Brooke about 5 miles away.Every fortnight a coach service to Eastbourne passes through Mayfield collecting passengers at 10am. & returning them at 3pm.Mayfield also has a Post Bus service;a mini_bus which can carry abou 12 passengers. It runs twice a day from Tunbridge Wells to Mayfield and return.Because public transport is so limited most families in Mayfield have a car & many have two.
